node_types.label: UserEquipment
node_types.description: The User Equipment (UE) is a device that connects to the network and performs communication.

node_types.label: ProtocolMessage
node_types.description: A message that carries data between network entities.

node_types.label: NetworkNode
node_types.description: A node in the network that can communicate with other nodes.

node_types.label: Timer
node_types.description: A timer that triggers an event.
